item.title: News
item.description: Dec 23 The following journal paper has been published this month: Melchor-Placencia, C., & MÃ¡laga-Chuquitaype, C. (2024, January). A nonlinear modelling framework for unbonded post-tensioned timber members. In Structures (Vol. 59, p. 105715). Elsevier. . Post-tensioning enhances the load-bearing capacity and deflection control of structural timber members. But it also introduces additional modelling complexities. With Carlos Melchor we have been exploring a fibre-based finite element (FE) analysis framework for the comprehensive simulation of post-tensioned timber members up to failure.

item.title: OpenArch:An open-source package for determining the minimum-thickness of arches under seismic loads
item.description: This repository contains the MatLab-based code called OpenArch for the design of optimal arch forms of minimum thickness subjected to seismic loads.

item.title: Seismic Design of Steel Structures (Imperial)
item.description: This graduate course introduces the principles of seismic design of steel structures.

item.title: Structural Dynamics (Imperial)
item.description: This undergraduate course covers the classical dynamics theory of SDOF.
